scripts.test:debug: set DEBUG=Y && set HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@debug' > output.txt
scripts.test:demo: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.test: smoke: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=Y && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
scripts.uat:demo: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.uat-conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.uat:smoke: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=Y && npx wdio config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
